name: Kingdom Hearts HD 1.5 ReMIX
description:
Kingdom Hearts HD 1.5 ReMIX is an action-RPG game developed by Square Enix. It was originally released in 2013. It was published by Square Enix. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Kingdom Hearts HD 1.5 ReMIX is available on PlayStation 3.
It was produced by Rie Nishi. It was directed by Tai Yasue and Tetsuya Nomura. It was scored by Yoko Shimomura.
